articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Healthy Prenatal Diet Linked to Lower Autism Risk - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study suggests that a healthy prenatal diet may lower the risk of autism and social communication difficulties in children, according to researchers who analyzed data from two large cohort studies in Norway and the UK.

articles.author: Viktorija Ošikaitė
articles.title: Dad Beyond Livid After Boomer Poisons His Son Trying To Prove His Delusional Point - Bored Panda
articles.description: A father vented online about a boomer who purposely and knowingly switched out his son’s dish for one with wheat after refusing to believe that celiac disease is real.
articles.content: There is a particularly annoying subset of people both online and in real life who live under the impression that just because they dont have an allergy or disease, then it must basically not be real… [+4996 chars]

articles.author: Jacqueline Howard
articles.title: Women with endometriosis face fourfold higher risk of ovarian cancer, study suggests - CNN
articles.description: The risk of developing ovarian cancer appears to jump about fourfold among women with endometriosis, compared with women who haven’t been diagnosed with the condition, a new study finds.
